title: Conduct Field Safety Audit
description: An HSE officer conducts a planned safety audit of a work crew performing maintenance, using a digital checklist.

tasks.description: Open the 'Field Maintenance Safety Audit' checklist on a tablet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct digital audit form is loaded.

tasks.description: Observe the work crew and complete the checklist items, such as verifying PPE usage, correct tool usage, and valid work permits.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit is conducted, and several items are marked as compliant, but one non-compliance (improperly stored ladder) is noted.

tasks.description: Log the non-compliance finding, assign a corrective action to the crew supervisor, and submit the completed audit report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit is submitted, and a corrective action is automatically tracked in the safety system.
